Frequently Asked Questions

How long are the language classes?

Each class session is 90 minutes long, with a short break in the middle.

What materials do I need for the classes?

We provide all essential learning materials, including textbooks and worksheets. You only need to bring a notebook and pen.

Can I join a class mid-term?

Yes, we accept new students throughout the year. Our teachers will help you catch up with the current class material.

How much does it cost?

Classes are Â£5 per session, with concessions available for students and low-income families. Contact us for more information about financial assistance.

Do you offer online classes?

Currently, all our classes are conducted in-person at our community center. However, we provide online resources to support your learning.

What is the class structure like?

Our classes are designed to be interactive and engaging, with a focus on practical communication skills. Each session includes vocabulary, grammar, conversation practice, and cultural elements.

How long is the course?

The complete course typically runs for 10-12 weeks per term, with three terms per year.

Is there homework?

Yes, we provide weekly homework assignments to reinforce your learning. These typically take 1-2 hours per week to complete.

Still Have Questions?

Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please feel free to contact us.
